EmailTemplate.name: 11-17-21 RET NCR Freshop Q4 Webinar Post Event.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Freshop Webinar: Holiday Best Practices
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’ve successfully completed the first NCR Freshop User Webinar! Whether you were able to dial-in live or planned to catch a rerun, we appreciate you taking the time to review NCR Freshop’s Holiday Best Practices. Download the video here <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/ldr.php?RCID=451b2d24a2ce1609c62e1fabbadba8f6]]> to watch a replay. Knowledge-based articles that expand on the topics that were discussed in the webinar: Holiday Slot Management <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/updating-fulfillment-slots-16-8-2018-1]]> Updating Fulfillment Slots <[[htps://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/holiday-slot-management]]> Quick Orders <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/quick-orders]]> Managing Store Information <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/managing-store-information-16-8-2018-1]]> We think it was a hit but would love to hear feedback from our current users – YOU! Click here <[[https://ncr.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_dmybeaGsna5EDJ4?Q_TS_ID=TS_9VcEv5o7136Qa5M&Q_TS_RS=Self&Q_EE_ANON=1&_=1]]> to take a quick, three-minute survey letting us know what you thought. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
